a1: Brazil are very good, such a fun team.
q2: How do you feel about that 8-1 loss to Germany?
a2: very resentful, I expected more about Brazil
q3: Brazil if I think it's a great team although more was expected from them
q4: Is Brazil losing its place at the top or will they bounce back by next year?
a4: They will probably do better by next year.
q5: How do you think Brazil will improve?
a5: If they can find a good big target forward, it would help out with some issues they had in the last World Cup.
